div.p: I think as an administrator they don’t tell you about... well they do, I suppose, warn you that it can be quite busy at times
and the clients that we deal with can get quite agitated and rude so until you’re actually in the situation you don’t really
realise sometimes how it affects you so yeah that can be a little, the first time you speak to an upset client on the phone,
can be quite challenging. But in beauty I think they do go through everything with you like as a beautician but I don’t think you'll ever really know
until something goes wrong how you’ll put it right because every client is different aren’t they so you never know what you’re going to get...
